PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElementAssemblyTypeOCSSuspension
PropertySetDef.Definition: Common energy suspension properties used in railway. The property set can be used by the predefined type SUSPENSION_ASSEMBLY of IfcElementAssembly.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireStagger
PropertyDef.Definition: Lateral displacement of the contact wire to opposite sides of the track centre at successive supports.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Distance from the top of the rail to the lower face of the contact wire, measured perpendicular to the track.
